title: Ariana Grande discography
summary: American singer Ariana Grande has released six studio albums, one compilation album, one live album, one remix album, two extended plays (EPs), 52 singles (including 16 as a featured artist), and 16 promotional singles. After signing with Republic Records, she released her debut single "Put Your Hearts Up" in December 2011. Across albums, singles and features, Grande has sold over 85 million records worldwide, making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time. Having amassed 98 billion consumed streams thus far, Grande is the most streamed female artist ever. She is also the most streamed female artist on Spotify and Apple Music.[1][2][3] She has amassed 71 chart entries on the Billboard Hot 100—the fourth most entries for a female artist—including six number ones and 19 top-10 hits.[4] Grande was named the '12th Artist of the Decade' of the 2010s,[5] and was ranked among Billboard's Greatest of All Time Hot 100 Artists, at number 78.[6]
